data.title: Bennington College History: Visual Arts
data.meta_description: A guide to the history of visual arts at Bennington College

The Bennington College Visual Arts Lecture Series Fall 2018, Trans Visualities: Crossings, Counter-Narratives, Collaborations addresses visual art's ongoing need for varied perspectives and brave new forms of border-crossing and representation. Tishman Lecture Hall on Tuesday evenings, 7:00-8:30 PM.
